author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower niche tile tips…I’m using a wood ledger board under the niche. This will help me make that row level. And it’ll be easier to prevent any problems above the niche, for example the tiles are too high or too low. Once I’m done with the ledger board, I patch my holes using Schluter ALL-SET and KERDI-BAND 🔥#tileshower #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Shower Niche Tile Tips - #shorts #tileshower #homerepairtutor
